doc:
Diana Cortesina https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diana_Cortesina 0 Diana Cortesina (Madrid, 1928 - Madrid, 22 May 2011) was a Spanish actress and vedette, who worked extensively in Argentina. She was raised in a family of artists, her father being the actor Roberto Fugazot, a member of the trio "Irusta-Fugazot-Demare". When she was very young, Cortesina emigrated to Argentina fleeing the Spanish Civil War. Her sister was the actress and film director, Helena Cortesina. Diana_Cortesina ( Madrid , 1928 - Madrid , 22_May_2011 ) was a_Spanish_actress_and_vedette , who worked extensively in Argentina .
